original_title: Raw Man #3: Bareback Men At Work
overview: Director Grant Adams continues his winning streak, bringing eleven hot men to the screen in his third Raw Man release. This time Grant’s camera uncovers the sex lives of men who work with their hands – and uncut cocks! Bareback Men At Work reveals the unbridled lust and raw animal passion that exists when men get horny during the day! There’s no stopping the sex urge when your dick gets hard as nails and you find a hot guy who’s willing to indulge in some afternoon fun and games.
title: Raw Man #3: Bareback Men At Work
